alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 28 at 6:28AM CDT until March 28 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern St. Helena Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northeastern East Feliciana Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Pike County in southern Mississippi... Southern Amite County in southern Mississippi... * Until 715 AM CDT. * At 628 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Felps, or 7 miles north of Clinton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, Liberty, Norwood, Felps and Gillsburg. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 5. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
